name: Cs4720androidradiostream
body:
### Welcome to the CS4720AndroidRadioStream page!

Notes:
* ClientManager class is intended to contain logic for setting up Clients, however while following GoogleApiClient.Builder() documentation, ran into some issues with the Builder and Contexts. Will look into this further, but for now I have just implemented the Client Builder logic in the onCreate() method of the MainActivity.

### Authors and Contributors
Andrew Kovalenko and Matt Krauser
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
